AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.description: I started programming because I find it fascinating how you can use code to create your own solutions and automate processes.

subpoints.description: I'm from Lutherstadt Wittenberg and enjoy working on-site so I can interact with colleagues face-to-face.
I'm very open to new technologies and always motivated to develop my skills.
I approach problems creatively and analytically, exploring different approaches to solving problems and then systematically choosing the most effective one.
